positions.comment: At the Public Docks in Ocracoke -- arrived 1:30pm
At the Public Docks in Ocracoke -- HOT DAY -- flying kites
Underway Pamlico Sound --  midway to Brant Island Shoal
Oriental Marina -- Pool is FINE -- Watching storms from Cindy approach
Oriental Marina -- Stuck in the slip -- low water --blowing 20+ SW
Anchored in Spooners Creek -- Great day despite finding leaky water tank.
Anchored in Mile Hammock Bay  --  all the dudes that passed me are here too!!
Waiting on Surf City Bridge opening
On anchor at Wrightsville Beach  --Long wait at the 3 bridges today
